content.rendered:
Mozzart Bet Kenya Review.

MozzartbetKenya is one of the many betting sites found in Kenya. Right now, it is one of the most popular betting sites in the country and their success is owed to a couple of reasons.

Mozzart Bet at a glance

Features – 7/10

Ease of Use – 8/10

Live Betting – 7/10

Odds – 7/10

Summary.

Mozzart provides you with an international betting experience, with the convenience of local betting sites. Features such as the low minimum stake and bonuses make it a fan favorite.

OVERALL

7.4/10

  In-depth Review

This online company has grown significantly ever since it’s launch and it has been able to set up two huge betting shops in Nairobi. Through these shops, the company is able to interact with clients and be able to get the required feedback. Their numerous discounts, coupled up by their bonus events, makes them stand out from the other betting sites in Kenya. This is particularly so, owing to the fact that jackpot events contribute greatly to increased membership in betting sites.

Homepage

Features.

What is fascinating about this site us the fact that the offer dual withdrawal options. This means that you have two methods of withdawing money. The first option involves the use if their website while the second one entails you going to one of their shops. They also have a pretty sleek website design that is simple and easy for anyone to use. The fact that they have multiple bonuses as well as livebet options makes them a more preferred betting site by Kenyans.

Learn more information about JengaCash

Jackpot.

This company offers a daily jackpot competition where participants can walk away with up to Ksh 10,000,000. In the event that only two people get all the 13 matches on the jackpot correctly, then the total amount of the win will be split amongst them. What is interesting about this jackpot even is that there are multiple cash bonuses for predicting all matches correctly. Consequently, if you wrongly predict all the matches, you will get to win Ksh 1,000. Anyone can try their luck with just 50 bob.

Cons.

Mozzart Bet FAQ

How to make deposits to mozzart bet.

There are two ways of making deposits on mozzartbet. The first one involves going to your phone and sending the amount if your choice to your account through their pay ill number. This is by far the easiest deposit method. Pesa Mkononi is another Mozzart bet services that allows you to make deposits and withdrawals for free. This is possible through their “over the country” deposit method which is done physically. All you have to do here is go to one of their betting shops and you will be able to deposit ant amount you wish for free. You also get to choose the reams to bet on while at the shop and interact with the staff.

What is the mozzart bet mpesa paybill number?

Their paybill number is- 290059

What is the mozzart bet customer care number?

They have a safari in Customer care number which is- 0709168000
